DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate efficacy safety sirolimus-eluting coronary stent `` Calypso '' ( Angioline , Russia ) comparison everolimus-eluting coronary stent `` Xience '' ( Abbott Vascular , USA )
DOC.brief_title: Sirolimus-eluting Stent CALYPSO v Everolimus-eluting Stent XIENCE
DOC.criteria: Patients consider coronary angioplasty stenting due Ischemic heart disease ( Stable angina , Unstable angina , nonST Myocardial Infarction ) . Target vessel lesion coronary artery diameter measurement > 2.5 mm & < 4.5 mm . Signed , document informed consent prior admission study Age < 18 year > 75 year Renal insufficiency ( GFR/MDRD < 30 ml/min ) Subject platelet count < 100,000 cells/mm3 > 700,000 cells/mm3 . Known nonadherence DAPT LVEF < 30 % Known oncology Severe cardiac valvular pathology , require operative treatment within 1 year Anemia ( HB < 100 g/l ) Continuing bleed Acute coronary syndrome ( STelevation Myocardial infarction ) Anamnesis previous coronary angioplasty/stenting CABG NYHA class ( dyspnoea ) IV hospitalization last year due Chronic cardiac failure primary diagnosis . Pregnancy Coronary pathology require CABG stag schedule coronary angioplasty/stenting except case unscheduled staged coronary angioplasty/stenting within 4 week primary procedure .
